title: Ralph's Gift: Erotic Romance Part 1
description: Ralph met Alice in a bar. She let him approach her, got him interested, made him lose a bet, then gave him one of the horniest experience of a blowjob he'd ever had in his entire life. After that, he gave her his number. And he didn't even know her name.The next time he saw her again was when she called his number instead of 911.And that was their true beginning. It was also the promise of the end.
author: Sandra Ross
